{{cpp/experimental/basic_string_view/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl | since=libfund_ts |
size_type copy( CharT* dest,
                size_type count,
                size_type pos {{=}} 0) const;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Copies the substring {{tt|[pos, pos + rcount)}} to the character string pointed to by {{tt|dest}}, where {{tt|rcount}} is the smaller of {{tt|count}} and {{c|size() - pos}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par | dest | pointer to the destination character string}}
{{par | pos | position of the first character}}
{{par | count | requested substring length}}
{{par end}} 

===Return value===
Number of characters copied

===Exceptions===
{{lc|std::out_of_range}} if {{c|1=pos &gt; size()}}.

===Complexity===
Linear in {{tt|rcount}}.
